entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ClaimsPrincipal and ClaimsIdentity type proxies hide properties on derived types #91526
  • Support AES-GCM for iOS #91523
    Future
  • 200kB size delta for minimal NativeAOT shared lib with reflection disabled mode #91518
  • `(byte[], (int, int))` struct spilled onto the stack when it doesn't have to #91517
  • [API Proposal]: Add `MemoryExtensions.GetSequenceHashCode` #91515
  • [API Proposal]: Add `SequenceCompareTo` methods to `Enumerable` #91514
  • [API Proposal]: Add overloads of `Rune.GetRuneAt` and `Rune.TryGetRuneAt` that take `ReadOnlySpan<char>` #91513
  • [wasm-node] Node process exits after C# main exits #91511

Closed

  • Inconsistent debug views of dictionaries #91506
  • Bad codegen with Vector64<int> and ^ leads to wrong output #91252
    8.0.0
  • There's gotta be a way for array to be able to store an unlimited amount of data with one final exception that say it can not, so https://source.dot.net/#System.Private.CoreLib/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Convert.cs,e54b8e5a7f9d845a doesn't have to throw an exception here for example #91450

PullRequests

Created

  • Add FreeBSD cases to sysinfo and gcenv. #91524
    os-freebsd, area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unsigned check of index inside ElementAt #91522
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Remove allocation in GetPropertyAsDWord for CNG. #91521
    area-System.Security
  • [iOS] Unconditionally suppress trimming warnings in HttpClientHandler #91520
    area-System.Net.Http, os-ios
  • Making installer tests pass on OSX-arm64 in Release build #91519
    area-Host
  • Reduce work done by RuntimeHelpers.TryGetHashCode on Mono #91516
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix the VN for xor operation #91503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 116.0.5845.140, windows: 116.0.5845.141 #91512
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update the assert to include Vector64/Vector128 CreateScalar #91504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove unused CLR_E_BIND_* errors #91488
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • 24% size delta for minimal NativeAOT shared lib with reflection disabled mode #35119
  • Container image built using source-built SDK may fail to run #34860
  • ContainerHttpException contains request instead of response #34979

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Dotnet SDK Installed via Snap is not working with Entity Framework Tool #34590
  • dotnet new should support multi-targeting #35065

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add EmptyContent on quickgrid #50498
  • `onclick` Event Fails in `nav.razor` Component After Adding `hero.razor` Component when Using Arbitrary Values in Class Attributes #50497
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50495

Closed

  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50480
  • @dotnet-policy-service agree company="Microsoft"@dotnet-policy-service agree [company="{your company}"]@dotnet-policy-service agree #50496

PullRequests

Updated

  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
  • Update selenium #50486
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2258971 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Do not review] Break LoadFromStoreCert to detect test failures #50485
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android AAB file > 150 M limitation on Google Play Console #17191
  • Xamarin.PreBuilt.iOS[42280:31645665] Could not resolve assembly System.Private.DataContractSerialization.resources, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=zh-CN, PublicKeyToken=null. Details: Could not load file or assembly #17189
  • Payload contains two or more files with the same destination path 'MauiApp1.pdb'. #17187
  • Only one of multiple DropGestureRecognizers under Android will receive the message.(.NET 8 preview 7) #17186

Closed

  • [MAUI][.NET8] recipeSearch project builds fail to compile when use 8.0.0-nightly.9076+sha.f0db96bd41-azdo.8316708. #17055
    .NET 8 GA
  • MAUI Class Library cannot convert jar files. #17185
  • Looks ugly as shit #17182

PullRequests

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17177
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ComplexTypeAttribute cannot be applied to value types #31618
  • Mapping string as primitive collection throws #31617
  • Collection with conversion to primitive collection throws #31616

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow primitive collection mappings to be returned directly from provider #31619

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #31620
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31602
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Increase the retry delay for throttling errors on Azure SQL. #31612
